description:
I thought I would end the Member Appreciation week with a little Rough Trade. And what would the holidays be like without a new toy!?
Duke has got the tatts for sure, and he seems to be right down the center when it comes to playing with guys or girls. When with a dude, he likes a dominate (but not rough!) type of guy, who wants to fuck him up the ass.
This actually started off as a standard solo, but when it came time to nut, Duke said he needed something "extra" to get him over the top. Fortunately, I had a new toy handy.
It's pretty hot to watch him slowly accommodate this moderately large toy on such a small-framed guy. Once he turned the vibro action on, he was over the moon!
title: Duke - Toys
